question: Is my marriage valid? got married to an English girl who converted to Islam, in the presence of two muslim male witnesses. There was no imam present at this wedding.
answer:
QUESTION
Not so long ago, I got married to an English girl who converted to Islam, in the presence of two muslim male witnesses. I proposed to her and she accepted. There was no imam present at this wedding. It was just the four of us. Is this wedding valid?
ANSWER


Share:
If there were, at least, two Muslim adult males at the Nikah, the Nikah is valid.

The presence of an Imaam is not a prerequisite for the validity of a Nikah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
